00017 namespace GeographicLib {

00019   using namespace std;
00020 
00021   const Math::real Gnomonic::eps0 = numeric_limits<real>::epsilon();
00022   const Math::real Gnomonic::eps = real(0.01) * sqrt(eps0);
00023 
00024   void Gnomonic::Forward(real lat0, real lon0, real lat, real lon,
00025                          real& x, real& y, real& azi, real& rk)
00026     const throw() {
00027     real sig, s, azi0, m;
00028     sig = _earth.Inverse(lat0, lon0, lat, lon, s, azi0, azi, m);
00029     const GeodesicLine line(_earth.Line(lat0, lon0, azi0));
00030     real M, Mx;
00031     line.Scale(sig, M, Mx);
00032     rk = M;
00033     if (M <= 0)
00034       x = y = Math::NaN();
00035     else {
00036       real rho = m/M;
00037       azi0 *= Constants::degree();
00038       x = rho * sin(azi0);
00039       y = rho * cos(azi0);
00040     }
00041   }
00042 
00043   void Gnomonic::Reverse(real lat0, real lon0, real x, real y,
00044                          real& lat, real& lon, real& azi, real& rk)
00045     const throw() {
00046     real
00047       azi0 = atan2(x, y) / Constants::degree(),
00048       rho = min(Math::hypot(x, y), _a/(2 * eps0));
00049     GeodesicLine line(_earth.Line(lat0, lon0, azi0));
00050     real lat1, lon1, azi1, M, s;
00051     int count = numit;
00052     if (rho * _f < _a / 2)
00053       s = _a * atan(rho/_a);
00054     else {
00055       real m, Mx, ang = 90;
00056       int trip = _f == 0 ? 1 : max(1, int(-log(rho/_a) / log(_f) + real(0.5)));
00057       while (count--) {
00058         s = line.Position(ang, lat1, lon1, azi1, m, true);
00059         line.Scale(ang, M, Mx);
00060         if (trip < 0 && M > 0)
00061           break;
00062         // Estimate new arc length assuming dM/da = -1.
00063         ang += (M - m/rho)/Constants::degree();
00064         if (M > 0)
00065           --trip;
00066       }
00067       s -= (m/M - rho) * M * M;
00068     }
00069     int trip = 0;
00070     // Reset count if previous iteration was OK; otherwise skip next iteration
00071     count = count < 0 ? 0 : numit;
00072     while (count--) {
00073       real m, Mx;
00074       real ang = line.Position(s, lat1, lon1, azi1, m);
00075       line.Scale(ang, M, Mx);
00076       if (trip)
00077         break;
00078       else if (M <= 0) {
00079         count = -1;
00080         break;
00081       }
00082       real ds = (m/M - rho) * M * M;
00083       s -= ds;
00084       if (abs(ds) < eps * _a)
00085         ++trip;
00086     }
00087     if (count >= 0) {
00088       lat = lat1; lon = lon1; azi = azi1; rk = M;
00089     } else
00090       lat = lon = azi = rk = Math::NaN();
00091     return;
00092   }
00093
